statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ 9 \\ 10 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -52 \\ -25 \\ -27 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ 9 \\ 10 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -52 \\ -25 \\ -27 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
